original_text: Meanwhile, the remainder of the Jews who were in the king’s provinces also assembled to protect themselves and get relief from their enemies. They killed seventy-five thousand of them but did not lay their hands on the plunder.
korean_text: 왕의 각 지방에 있는 다른 유다인들이 모여 스스로 생명을 보호하여 대적들에게서 벗어나며 자기들을 미워하는 자 칠만 오천 명을 도륙하되 그들의 재산에는 손을 대지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: Meanwhile, the remainder of the Jews
who were in the king's provinces
and get relief from their enemies.
They killed seventy-five thousand of them
but did not lay their hands on the plunder.
